channel.title: Char appearance
channel.description: Ok so when I try to change my char appearance on my server(::char), First off it wont let me accept the change to the characters appearance. Then when I type ::male or ::female, log out, then log back in my char goes back to default. Any ideas on how to help? :rolleyes:

item.title: Char appearance
item.dc:creator: @Phoenixx Phoenixx
item.description:
@Phoenixx wrote:

Ok so when I try to change my char appearance on my server(::char), First off it wont let me accept the change to the characters appearance.
Then when I type ::male or ::female, log out, then log back in my char goes back to default.
Any ideas on how to help? :rolleyes:
